title: Pence hits the campaign trail for G.O.P. candidates and raises his own visibility.
description: As Election Day nears, the former vice president is appearing around the country, seeking to bolster Republican turnout.
dc:creator: Maggie Haberman

media:content.media:credit: Audra Melton for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Gov. Brian Kemp of Georgia, left, and his wife, Marty Kemp, campaigned on Tuesday with former Vice President Mike Pence in Cumming, Ga. Mr. Pence has made campaign stops around the country to support Republican candidates.
